Name: Furry Puzzle
About the game: Wishlist our friends' new game My Furry Dragon: / Short puzzle game with beautiful furry girls. Relaxing music and cozy yet spicy atmosphere. Awesome for relax after a day at work. Features: • Additive Gameplay • Full HD Artworks • Relaxing music • LGBTQ+ friendly • The best way to spend your night alone (or family if you are brave enough)! • Great gift for a furry lovers and even haters just to troll them. • Art by @ZHADART
